channel.title: Ipod Linux.... Need Help
channel.description:
Im trying to put it on my nano and when i click on the installer it says it cant find my ipod..
Yes it is connected. I just restored it and it is on windows
What do i do? i need someone who has actually done this.
Yes i know linux is not supported on it but i have seen nanos with it on.
OH Btw this is for a 8gb 2nd generation NANO

item.title: Ipod Linux.... Need Help

@mrisace wrote:
